name: personal-history-archive
description: A server and browser extension for saving a personal archive
author: Ian Bicking <ian@ianbicking.org>

scripts.start: npm run build && web-ext run -f nightly -s tracker-extension/ --browser-console
scripts.build:zip: mkdir -p build && web-ext build --source-dir tracker-extension/ --ignore-files '**/README.md' --ignore-files '**/*.template' --overwrite-dest && mv web-ext-artifacts/personal_history_saver*.zip build/tracker-extension.zip && rmdir web-ext-artifacts || true
scripts.build: mkdir -p tracker-extension/build && python python/pha/sub-env-vars.py < tracker-extension/buildSettings.js.tmpl > tracker-extension/build/buildSettings.js
scripts.test: npm run test:build-data && npm run test:build-ext && npm run test:selenium
scripts.test:build-ext: NATIVE_SCRIPT=pha.saver.test IDLE_WAIT_TIME=0 HISTORY_PAUSE=0 LOG_LEVEL=debug SERVER_LOG_LEVEL=debug npm run build && npm run build:zip && python -m pha.saver --script-location test/test-data/pha-saver-script.py --native-name pha.saver.test test/test-data/
scripts.test:stop-server: test -e test/test-data/server.pid && kill $(cat test/test-data/server.pid) && rm test/test-data/server.pid
